primaryTopic.creator: http://editor.vocabs.ands.org.au/user/Natalia-Atkins
primaryTopic.dcSource: Australian Ocean Data Network Organisation Register
primaryTopic.definition: The Office of the Environmental Protection Authority was established on 27 November 2009 to support the EPA in conducting environmental impact assessments and developing policies to protect the environment. The OEPA also monitors compliance with Ministerial conditions related to approvals.
primaryTopic.isReplacedBy: Department of Water and Environmental Regulation (DWER), Western Australian Government

prefLabel._value: Office of Environmental Protection Authority (OEPA), Western Australian Government

primaryTopic.scopeNote: Organisation no longer exists. Replaced by Department of Water and Environmental Regulation (DWER), Western Australian Government.
